revision.text:
==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|yiff|y}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{a|GA}} {{enPR|yĭfʹē}}, {{IPA|en|/ˈjɪfi/}} * {{rhymes|en|ɪfi|s=2}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|er}} # Of or pertaining to [[yiff]] (sexual intercourse among [[furry#Noun|furries]]). #* "It's just a list of furs who enjoy more adult, ie. '''yiffy''', subject matter." — [http://groups-beta.google.com/group/alt.lifestyle.furry/msg/59813bf1293310dd] # {{lb|en|furry subculture}} Sexually [[aroused]] #* "Hello world, I'm a big-breasted vixen
Come on, get '''yiffy'''!
A whole lot of spooge is what we'll be seein'
We'll make you '''yiffy'''!"
— [http://groups-beta.google.com/group/alt.fan.furry/msg/34b7f78f0b4ec511] ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|sexually aroused}} {{l|en|sexy}}, {{l|en|horny}} [[Category:en:Furry fandom]]
